subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Cam Ward improved to 5-0 during regulation and the Carolina Hurricanes took over the league lead in power-play goals in their 3-1 victory over the visiting Vancouver Canucks.
snippet: Cam Ward improved to 5-0 during regulation and the Carolina Hurricanes took over the league lead in power-play goals in their 3-1 victory over the visiting Vancouver Canucks.
